title: Who's That in the Cat Pajamas?
description: Dolcey has a wonderful calling. Her calling is to help children when they are in trouble. When Emily hears a dreadful announcement, she cries out.Dolcey immediately grabs her cat pajamas and goes to find the child. This begins the adventure of a lifetime for Emily. The magic and adventure begin as soon as the cat arrives.
author: Sojourner McConnell
